meta.name: description
meta.content: Charter School of Educational Excellence is an Elementary School located in Yonkers, New York.

div.marquee: CSEE will remain closed through May 15

div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1364px; height: 666px;

section.p:
Dear CSEE Parents and Guardians,
Please find CSEE's April 2020 newsletter attached. Please see the newsletter for important information regarding our remote learning program, parent teacher conferences, social distancing, our amazing middle school extension projects, Athletic updates, and more.

Lottery date: April 14, 2020 at 9:00. Please join the meeting by clicking on the link - https://youtu.be/duNHIcNnQJw
El sorteo de lotería es en: abril 14, 2020 a las 9:00 a. m. Por favor únase a la reunión dando un click en el vínculo (link) - https://youtu.be/duNHIcNnQJw

section.p: An article from the National Association of School Psychologists

h1.a: CSEE is still accepting 2020-2021 Lottery Application Forms

section.p:
Dear CSEE Parents and Guardians,
Please find attached the Lottery Application Form (in English and Spanish) for CSEE for the 2020-2021 school year.

Tech support will be available between the hours of 7am to 5pm Monday through Friday, all tickets that are submitted in a timely manner will be resolved the same day any tickets after 5pm will be on hold for the next day.

td.a: Half Day for Students (12 PM Dismissal) - Staff PD
